data.description: Tieable array that allows only unique values
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I am not sure if the right name is Array::Unique or something like
    Tie::UniqueArray but the first one is shorter and it emphasizes
    functionality rather than implementation which IMHO is the tight
    thing to do.

    For my best knowldge there is no module supporting this
    functionality.
